messages.message:
Hey team, wasn’t sure which channel or team handles this, so posting here. Let me know and will x-post.

The platform login url in dogfood (https://dogfood.instabase.com/) always redirects to instabase.com (prod) login page (https://instabase.com/account/login), was so confusing :lolcry:, took me a while to realise I was in instabase.com (http://instabase.com) despite trying from dogfood. *Is this intentional or a bug?*

we don’t have control over the content of the marketing website, and the same marketing website is used for all environments (dogfood and prod)

so we don’t have a way to fix this, i believe
Hey the marketing website is actually different between dogfood and prod @Serena. I think either @aristo or @nikita would be able to fix this link
not intentional - thanks for the call out. updated!
